Bitcoin uses proof of work  Cardano, Dash, and Qtum — are using proof of stake   EOS, Lisk, and Tron – use delegated proof of stake  Ethereum is moving away from proof of work  We need to start to contemplate what staking as a service looks like. (D)POS is centralized banking IMO
